summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1809, for the improvement of Fifteenth Avenue West, from the south margin of West Newton Street to the north margin of West Armour Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues therein named, all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same, as providing for the necessary bulkheads and drainage, under Ordinance No. 18817 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
